/* eslint-disable react/prop-types */ import { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; import { Icon } from "@iconify/react"; import { Link, NavLink, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; // For maintainability, it's best to move this configuration to its own file (e.g., `menuConfig.js`). // A sample of your menu items is included here to demonstrate the pattern. const menuConfig = [ { id: "dashboard", isDropdown: true, title: "Dashboard", icon: "solar:home-smile-angle-outline", children: [ { to: "/", title: "AI", colorClass: "text-primary-600" }, { to: "/index-2", title: "CRM", colorClass: "text-warning-main" }, { to: "/index-3", title: "eCommerce", colorClass: "text-info-main" }, // ... add other dashboard items here ], }, { isGroupTitle: true, title: "Application" }, { id: "email", to: "/email", title: "Email", icon: "mage:email" }, { id: "chat", to: "/chat-message", title: "Chat", icon: "bi:chat-dots" }, { id: "invoice", isDropdown: true, title: "Invoice", icon: "hugeicons:invoice-03", children: [ { to: "/invoice-list", title: "List", colorClass: "text-primary-600" }, { to: "/invoice-preview", title: "Preview", colorClass: "text-warning-main" }, { to: "/invoice-add", title: "Add new", colorClass: "text-info-main" }, { to: "/invoice-edit", title: "Edit", colorClass: "text-danger-main" }, ], }, { id: "ai-app", isDropdown: true, title: "Ai Application", legacyIcon: "ri-robot-2-line mr-10", // For icons using tags children: [ { to: "/text-generator", title: "Text Generator", colorClass: "text-primary-600" }, { to: "/code-generator", title: "Code Generator", colorClass: "text-warning-main" }, // ... add other AI app items here ], }, // ... The rest of your menu items would follow this structure ]; const DropdownMenuItem = ({ item, isOpen, onToggle }) => { const submenuRef = useRef(null); return (
  • { e.preventDefault(); onToggle(); }} > {item.icon && } {item.legacyIcon && } {item.title}

    • ); }; const Sidebars = ({ children }) => { const [sidebarActive, setSidebarActive] = useState(false); const [mobileMenu, setMobileMenu] = useState(false); const [openDropdownId, setOpenDropdownId] = useState(null); const location = useLocation(); // Effect to open the correct dropdown based on the current URL useEffect(() => { const activeDropdown = menuConfig.find( (item) => item.isDropdown && item.children.some((child) => child.to === location.pathname) ); if (activeDropdown) { setOpenDropdownId(activeDropdown.id); } // No need to close others here, the logic below handles it. }, [location.pathname]); const toggleDropdown = (id) => { setOpenDropdownId(openDropdownId === id ? null : id); }; const toggleSidebar = () => { setSidebarActive(!sidebarActive); }; const toggleMobileMenu = () => { setMobileMenu(!mobileMenu); }; return (
    {/* sidebar */}

    • {item.title}
